column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Came back a year later. Food is still amazing
column2: we came to celebrate my boyfriends the birthday. Jameson and Pickleback shots are our new favorite. We had the lobster
column5: the beef stroganoff and wild mushrooms. While most of the staff was great we did have one rude server. Â Thankfully this server was only there temporarily until a much better waiter named Julio was done with another table. Julio was kind
column6: attentive and just overall a good guy that saved our birthday celebration.
